contentrichtext.text: '''Verneuil''' may refer to: ==Places in France== *[[Verneuil, Charente]], in the Charente ''département'' *[[Verneuil, Cher]], in the Cher ''département'' *[[Verneuil, Marne]], in the Marne ''département'' *[[Verneuil, Nièvre]], in the Nièvre ''département'' *[[Verneuil-en-Bourbonnais]], in the Allier ''département'' *[[Verneuil-en-Halatte]], in the Oise ''département'' *[[Verneuil-Grand]], in the Meuse ''département'' *[[Verneuil-le-Château]], in the Indre-et-Loire ''département'' *[[Verneuil-l'Étang]], in the Seine-et-Marne ''département'' *[[Verneuil-Moustiers]], in the Haute-Vienne ''département'' *[[Verneuil-Petit]], in the Meuse ''département'' *[[Verneuil-sous-Coucy]], in the Aisne ''département'' *[[Verneuil-sur-Avre]], in the Eure ''département'' *[[Verneuil-sur-Igneraie]], in the Indre ''département'' *[[Verneuil-sur-Indre]], in the Indre-et-Loire ''département'' *[[Verneuil-sur-Seine]], in the Yvelines ''département'' *[[Verneuil-sur-Serre]], in the Aisne ''département'' *[[Verneuil-sur-Vienne]], in the Haute-Vienne ''département'' ==People== *[[Aristide Auguste Stanislas Verneuil]] (1823–1895), a French physician and surgeon * [[Auguste Victor Louis Verneuil]] (1856–1913), a French chemist * [[Henri Verneuil]] (1920–2002), a French-Armenian playwright and filmmaker * [[Louis Verneuil]] (1893–1952), a French writer and actor * [[Maurice Pillard Verneuil]] (1869–1942), a French designer ==History== * [[Battle of Verneuil]], an English victory in the Hundred Years' War {{geodis}} {{disambig}}
